name: Python LSP Investigation
details: Investigate and fix Python LSP connectivity issues after Python 3.12 upgrade. All Python tests are failing with "lsp connection closed" error.

tasks.name: Analyze Python LSP Setup
tasks.details: Read server-manager.ts to understand how Python LSP server is configured and installed

tasks.name: Check Python LSP Server State
tasks.details: Check what Python LSP server is installed and if it's compatible with Python 3.12

tasks.name: Test Manual Python LSP
tasks.details: Try to run Python LSP analysis manually to isolate the exact failure point

tasks.name: Fix Python 3.12 Compatibility
tasks.details: Implement fix for Python 3.12 compatibility issue with LSP server

tasks.name: Verify Fix
tasks.details: Run Python-specific tests to confirm fix works
